lead_paragraph: I've been reading Kevin O'Rourke at the Irish Economy blog, watching with astonishment and admiration as the mild-mannered economic historian becomes Isaiah, righteously denouncing what has been passing for responsible policy. Now the even more usually mild-mannered Barry Eichengreen weighs in, calling it what it is: reparations imposed on an innocent public.

headline.main: The Shrill Has Moved To Europe
